com.ephesoft.dcma.workflows.util

Class WorkflowCreationUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.workflows.util.WorkflowCreationUtil

  • public class WorkflowCreationUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a utility class to create various BPMN constructs.
